sections.title: Press room
sections.description:
Cora is the first and leading digital bank exclusively focused on SMBs in Brazil. The company provides a one-stop solution by bringing together a multi-product credit offering, banking service and a full suite of business analytics tools. 

Our mission is to increase the likelihood of SMB entrepreneurs achieving their dreams.
sections.englishDescription: Cora is the first and leading digital bank exclusively focused on SMBs in Brazil. The company provides a one-stop solution by bringing together a multi-product credit offering, banking service and a full suite of business analytics tools.
sections.portugueseDescription: A Cora é o primeiro e principal banco digital voltado exclusivamente para PMEs no Brasil. A empresa fornece uma solução única, reunindo uma oferta de crédito multiproduto, serviço bancário e um conjunto completo de ferramentas de análise de negócios.
sections.englishSmallDescription: Our mission is to increase the likelihood of SMB entrepreneurs achieving their dreams.
sections.portugueseSmallDescription: Nossa missão é aumentar a probabilidade de os empreendedores de PMEs realizarem seus sonhos.

cards.title: Contact Us
cards.portugueseParagraph: Entre em contato com nossa equipe de relações com a imprensa

sections.subscribleTitle: Subscribe to get Cora’s latest news on your inbox
sections.subscribeText: Subscribe to get Cora’s latest news on your inbox
sections.englishText: Subscribe to get Cora’s latest news on your inbox.
sections.portugueseText: Inscreva-se para receber as últimas notícias de Cora em sua caixa de entrada
